reviewText: This was a nicely done series. If you enjoy any of "The Lost World" movies or TV shows based on the book by Arthur Conan Doyle, you will probably enjoy this "Land of the Lost" series. This was definitely made for family entertainment and it does not fail. The cast is good, and the sets and music add to make a great production by Sid and Marty Krofft. Children will especially enjoy it.

the search starts off there looking for more crystals, then will see's something in the distance, turns out to be lots of crystals,  will this help them get home? maybe, got to watch this one, because someone might go home, who is it? this is great show if your into land of the lost like I was, one of those you have to watch. and lots more of caves and sleestaks great for kids to watch too. funny and somewhat stupid, but make a great show. I grew up with these shows.
